scripts.deploy-staging: rm -rf generated && graph codegen ./subgraph-kovan-staging.yaml && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ $KOVAN_ENDPOINT ./subgraph-kovan-staging.yaml --access-token $GRAPH_ACCESS_TOKEN
scripts.deploy: sh -c 'yarn run _create ${0}; yarn run _deploy ${0} | grep -E "Build completed: Qm[a-zA-Z0-9]+" | grep -oE "Qm[a-zA-Z0-9]+" | xargs -I{} sh -c "echo $(date -u) NAME: ${0}, ACTION: DEPLOYED, IPFS_HASH: {}, COMMIT: $(git rev-parse HEAD)  >> results.txt"'
scripts.delete: sh -c 'yarn run _remove ${0}; sh -c "echo $(date -u) NAME: ${0}, ACTION: REMOVED  >> results.txt"'
